headline.main: VICHY LABOR CODE IS GIVEN TO NATION; Charter Imposes Arbitration, Bans Strikes and Lockouts and Bars Union Politics

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Oct. 27 -- Marshal Henri Philippe Petain's Labor Charter, heralded for months as the cornerstone of his National Revolution was published in the Journal Officiel today.
snippet: VICHY, France, Oct. 27 -- Marshal Henri Philippe Petain's Labor Charter, heralded for months as the cornerstone of his National Revolution was published in the Journal Officiel today....
